game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Find and return the stolen family heirloom to Lady Whimsy
game.description: Lady Whimsy's treasured necklace has gone missing, and she needs your help to retrieve it. The thief is likely hiding in one of the nearby villages.
game.reward: 500 gold pieces and a boost to reputation with the nobility

tasks.objective: Investigate the scene of the crime
tasks.description: Speak to the staff at Whimsy Manor and gather information about the last time they saw the necklace.

tasks.objective: Search the nearby villages for clues
tasks.description: Visit the villages of Oakwood, Willowdale, and Greenhaven to see if anyone has seen the thief or has information about the necklace.

tasks.objective: Confront the thief and retrieve the necklace
tasks.description: Once you have gathered enough information, track down the thief and demand they return the stolen heirloom.
